price: Lalle, haƙĩƙa, kalma* tã wajaba a kan mafi yawansu, dõmin sũ, bã zã su yi ĩmãni ba.
arabic: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: * Kalma a nan ita ce faɗar Allah da take cewa zai yi azãba ga kãfirin da bai yi ĩmãni ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqa al-qawlu ʿalā aktharihim fahum lā yu'minūna
